articles.description: Watch BBC Two coverage and follow live text as the Women’s Euro 2025 draw in Lausanne, Switzerland.
articles.title: Women's Euro 2025 Draw LIVE: Watch live stream as England & Wales discover opponents

articles.description: UK Sport says it will invest a record £330m in Britain's Olympic and Paralympic sports for the 2028 Games in Los Angeles.
articles.title: 2028 LA Games: UK Sport to invest a record £330m in Britain's Olympic and Paralympic sports

articles.description: England's slide towards a massive defeat in the third Test against New Zealand is compounded by a concerning recurrence of Ben Stokes' hamstring injury.
articles.title: New Zealand vs England: Ben Stokes injured and Kane Williamson makes century in Hamilton

articles.description: Players on next year's United States Ryder Cup team will be paid to compete for the first time in the history of the matches.
articles.title: Ryder Cup 2025: USA to pay players £400,000 for Bethpage matches

articles.description: The Buffalo Bills played in another high-scoring thriller, Patrick Mahomes picked up a worrying injury and three teams booked play-off places on Sunday.
articles.title: NFL results & week 15 recap: Josh Allen leads Bills, Mahomes injury worry for Chiefs

articles.description: England build a lead of 145 after South Africa lose their last seven first-innings wickets for 44 runs late on day two.
articles.title: South Africa v England: Lauren Bell takes four wickets as Proteas collapse on day two

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at whether teams who sack their manager while in the relegation zone usually stay up or go down.
articles.title: Russell Martin & Gary O'Neil: Does sacking a Premier League manager help you avoid relegation?

articles.description: Austria and Rapid Vienna striker Guido Burgstaller had his skull fractured when he was attacked in the centre of Vienna.
articles.title: Guido Burgstaller skull fractured in attack in Vienna

articles.description: A confected contest featuring Rory McIlroy and Scottie Scheffler taking on Bryson DeChambeau and Brooks Koepka is tasty enough to be worth watching, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: 'PGA Tour v LIV - why 'Showdown' with McIlroy & Scheffler v DeChambeau & Koepka is significant'

articles.description: Australia's seamers ensure they stay in control of the third Test against India, despite rain decimating much of day three in Brisbane.
articles.title: Australia vs India: Hosts' seamers impress but rain ruins day three of third Test in Brisbane
